summary: Provides a flexible filtering framework for integration test targets, defining generic and specialized filters that evaluate host configurations (Docker, network inventory, remote, POSIX, Windows, etc.) against supplied arguments and availability, and exposing helper utilities for configuration maps and skip-alias lookups.
business_intent: Enable integration test runs to automatically select only those hosts that satisfy the required platform, remote, and inventory criteria, avoiding unsupported or unavailable targets and ensuring reliable, contextâ€‘aware test execution.
